result.execSummary:
The defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Danette Lorainne Sharlow is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Danette Lorainne Sharlow was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Bruce Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moved to amend count 2 to county ord. and dismiss count 1.  Court will amend count 2 to co. ord. DC and count 1 is dismissed.  DE entered NC plea.  Court finds defendant guilty $834.50 given 30 days to pay or set up payment plan.

Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury set for 11/7/16 at 8:30.  Atty Larimore no resolution at this time.  Court:  Jury instructions by 10/31/16 as well as witness list.

Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Larimore request 1 day trial.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Larimore just received this case.
Reset.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 12, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Danette Lorainne Sharlow in court with attorney Vincent Kurta appearing by phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Kurta filed and court granted a motion to withdraw.  Court advises DEF to contact public defender.  Status conference scheduled for February 16, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Atty Kurta withdraws as Atty for DEF

Statutory Minimum Domestic Abuse Bail Conditions
As a condition of my release from custody in this matter, I agree that I will not engage in any threats or acts of domestic abuse against the victim "    " or any other person.
I understand that "domestic abuse" means:
Intentional infliction of physical pain, injury or illness.
Intentional impairment of physical condition. 
First, second or third degree sexual assault.  
A physical act that may cause the other person reason to fear imminent engagement in the conduct described above, including but not limited to the intentional destruction of physical property.
